text: لقد خلقنا الانسن فى احسن تقويم

translations.translation: We created man in the finest mould.
That We created man of finest possibilities,
surely We created man in the best mould;
We have created the human being in the best form
We have indeed created man in the best shape.
Verily, We created man in the best form.
Certainly We created man in the best make.
We indeed created Man in the fairest stature
Surely We created man of the best stature
We have indeed created man in the best of mould,
Assuredly We have created man in goodliest mould,
We certainly created man in the best of forms;
We have indeed created man in the best of moulds,
Verily, We created man of the best stature (mould),
Indeed, We created the human with the fairest stature
We created man in the best design.
We have certainly created man in the best of stature;
[95:4] Verily We created man (al-insān: the generic) in the best of forms, [in the best] proportioning of his shape.

(Surely We created man) the disbelieving man, referring here to al-Walid Ibn al-Mughirah, and it is also said it refers to Kildah Ibn Usayd (of the best stature) in the best of forms; and this is the reason why the oath was made.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلإِنسَانَ فِيۤ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ } معناه في أحسنِ صُورةٍ

translations.translation: And the saying of Allah, "We have created man in the best of forms" - meaning in the best of shapes.
